Documentation.content: Will take a potentially sparse file d and fill in the missing with value v for Discrete Field datasets
Documentation.firstline: Will take a potentially sparse file d and fill in the missing

param.name: d0
param.desc: They myriad format Discrete Field dataset to be filled

param.name: v
param.desc: The value to assign missing records

Documentation.return: A full Discrete Field dataset with every field populated
